fullText:
Vengeance Recalled

Epic Tier
Prerequisite: 21st level, avenger, oath of enmity power
Benefit: When you miss with an avenger power against your oath of enmity target, you gain a +5 bonus to damage rolls against that target until the end of your next turn.

Published in Divine Power, page(s) 143.
name: Vengeance Recalled
